00001 /**************************************************************************
00002 $Header: WN_BORD.C Fri 10-27-2000 9:34:42 pm HvA V2.01 $
00003 
00004 DESC: Border routines for HVA_WIN
00005 HIST: 20001027 V2.01 - Adapted for DJGPP
00006 ***************************************************************************/
00007 
00008 #include "video/v_video.h"
00009 #include "window.h"
00010 
00011 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00012    FUNCTION: wn_border()
00013     PURPOSE: Draw a border around a window
00014      SYNTAX: int wn_border(WINDOW *w, int style);
00015 DESCRIPTION: WINDOW *w = pointer to a window control block
00016              int style = style of border to draw
00017              The style does not change the attribute of the border.
00018     RETURNS: NO_WINDOW: window not opened
00019              TRUE     : all ok
00020     HISTORY: 910709 V0.1
00021 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00022 int wn_border(WINDOWPTR w, int style)
00023 {
00024 
00025   wn_log("wn_border(%p,%s, style = %2d)\n",w,w->title,style);
00026 
00027   /*----------------------------------
00028     Check if window opened and topped
00029   -----------------------------------*/
00030   if (!w)
00031     return(NO_WINDOW);
00032   if (w != top_window)
00033     wn_top(w);
00034 
00035   if (w->btype != _NO_BORDER) {
00036     wn_setbox(style);
00037     v_drawbox(w->wy1,w->wx1,w->xsize,w->ysize,w->bcolor);
00038     return(TRUE);
00039   }
00040   else
00041     return(FALSE);
00042 }
00043 
00044 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00045    FUNCTION: wn_dborder()
00046     PURPOSE: Draw a border around a window
00047      SYNTAX: int wn_dborder(WINDOW *w,
00048                             int ul, int ur, int tb, int sd, int ll, int lr);
00049 DESCRIPTION: Sets box characters and calls wn_border
00050              ul = upper left
00051              ur = upper right
00052              tb = top/bottom
00053              sd = sides
00054              ll = lower left
00055              lr = lower right
00056     RETURNS: Always TRUE
00057     HISTORY: 910709 V0.1 - Initial version
00058 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 #ifdef DONT_SKIP_THIS
00060 
00061 int wn_dborder(WINDOW *w, int ul, int ur, int tb, int sd, int ll, int lr)
00062 {
00063   wn_log("wn_dborder(%p,%s)\n",w,w->title);
00064 
00065   /*------------------------
00066     Check if window opened
00067   --------------------------*/
00068   if (!w)
00069     return(NO_WINDOW);
00070   if (w != top_window)
00071     wn_top(w);
00072 
00073   v_setboxchars(ul,ur,tb,sd,ll,lr);
00074   wn_border(w,w->btype);
00075   return(TRUE);
00076 }
00077 
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------

00082      PURPOSE: Set box outline-art to double or single lines
00083       SYNTAX: void wn_setbox(int style);
00084  DESCRIPTION: The style can be _SINGLE_LINE or _DOUBLE_LINE

00086               ∫ FRAME 0 ∫ ≥ FRAME 1 ≥ ∫ FRAME 2 ∫  ≥ FRAME 3 ≥  ≥ FRAME 4≥

00089                           ‹ ‹ ‹‹‹‹‹‹‹ ‹  ∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞  ±±±±±±±±±±±  ≤≤≤≤≤≤≤≤≤≤

00098      RETURNS: nothing
00099      HISTORY: 910717 V0.1 - Initial version
00100               920920 V0.2 - Added additional frame types
00101 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102 void wn_setbox(int style)
00103 {
00104   switch (style) {
00105                     /* setboxchars( ul, to, ur, ri, lr, bo, ll, le); */
00106     case _SINGLE_LINE: v_setboxchars(218,196,191,179,217,196,192,179); break;
00107     case _DOUBLE_LINE: v_setboxchars(201,205,187,186,188,205,200,186); break;
00108     case FRAME_0     : v_setboxchars(218,196,191,179,217,196,192,179); break;
00109     case FRAME_1     : v_setboxchars(201,205,187,186,188,205,200,186); break;
00110     case FRAME_2     : v_setboxchars(214,196,183,186,189,196,211,186); break;
00111     case FRAME_3     : v_setboxchars(213,205,184,179,190,205,212,179); break;
00112     case FRAME_4     : v_setboxchars(213,205,184,179,217,196,192,179); break;
00113     case FRAME_5     : v_setboxchars( 32, 32, 32, 32, 32, 32, 32, 32); break;
00114     case FRAME_6     : v_setboxchars(220,220,220,222,223,223,223,221); break;
00115     case FRAME_7     : v_setboxchars(176,176,176,176,176,176,176,176); break;
00116     case FRAME_8     : v_setboxchars(177,177,177,177,177,177,177,177); break;
00117     case FRAME_9     : v_setboxchars(178,178,178,178,178,178,178,178); break;
00118     case FRAME_10    : v_setboxchars(219,219,219,219,219,219,219,219); break;
00119     case FRAME_11    : v_setboxchars('*','*','*','*','*','*','*','*'); break;
00120     default          : v_setboxchars(218,191,191,179,217,196,192,179); break;
00121   }
00122 }
